rules.natural: Under the condition that the conference serves alcohol to attendees, the conference does not have funding from the university.
Whenever author2 submits a paper to the conference and the proceedings are published in a journal, the conference is successful.
Provided that attendee1 registers early for the conference, attendee1 pays the fee.
Either attendee1 registers early for the conference or attendee2 registers late for the conference.
In the case that attendee2 registers late for the conference, author3's paper is not rejected.
Whenever attendee1 pays the fee for the conference, attendee1 registers for sessions.
Provided that attendee1 receives materials from the conference, author3's paper is not rejected.
If attendee1 registers for sessions at the conference, then attendee1 receives materials.
The conference is cancelled or the conference is successful.
Whenever the hotel has the venue booked for the conference, the conference is not cancelled.
Should the hotel arrange catering for the conference, the hotel has the venue booked.
Under the condition that fire drills were conducted at the hotel, the emergency exits are marked.

Provided that the conference is organized by an academic institution, either the conference has multiple industry sponsors or, under the condition that the conference is prestigious, the conference is successful.
In the case that the conference is organized by a professional association, either the conference has multiple industry sponsors or, if the conference is prestigious, the conference is successful.
If the conference is university-hosted by the local university, then the conference is organized by an academic institution.
Either the conference is university-hosted by the local university or society-hosted by an international society.
Should the conference be society-hosted by an international society, the conference is organized by a professional association.
If the hotel signed a contract for the conference, then the hotel has the venue booked.
The hotel signed a contract for the conference or an agreement was made between the hotel and the conference.
Under the condition that the conference is scheduled late in the evening, the conference has a networking session.
If the conference is scheduled late in the evening, then the conference does not conflict with dinner.
Should an agreement be made between the hotel and the conference, a deal is confirmed between the hotel and the conference.
If a deal is confirmed between the hotel and the conference, then the hotel has the venue booked.
Either virtual attendance is allowed for the conference or, if the conference has a networking session, then the conference conflicts with dinner.
Whenever the keynote speaker for the conference is a famous researcher, the conference is successful.
Either the keynote speaker for the conference is a famous researcher or the proceedings are published in a journal.
If the proceedings of the conference are published in a journal, then the conference is prestigious.
Either author1 has a paper accepted at the conference or author2 submitted a paper to the conference.
If it is not the case that serving alcohol to attendees implies funding from the university, then the conference is scheduled late in the evening.
If it is not the case that hiring security implies arranging catering, then fire drills were conducted at the hotel.
Provided that it is false that author1's paper acceptance and proceedings publication imply a successful conference, then author3's paper is rejected.
Under the condition that the conference is not successful, the conference serves alcohol to attendees.

facts.natural: The hotel hired security for the conference.
The emergency exits are not marked at the hotel.
The conference does not have multiple industry sponsors.
Virtual attendance is not allowed for the conference.

Provided that the conference is scheduled late in the evening, the conference conflicts with dinner.
The conference is not scheduled late in the evening.
If the conference serves alcohol to attendees, then the conference has funding from the university.
The conference does not serve alcohol to attendees.
The conference is successful.
If attendee1 pays the fee for the conference, then attendee1 receives materials.
Should attendee1 pay the fee for the conference, author3's paper is not rejected.
If attendee1 registers early for the conference, then author3's paper is not rejected.
Author3's paper is not rejected.
Under the condition that author1 has a paper accepted at the conference and the proceedings are published in a journal, the conference is successful.
Provided that the proceedings are published in a journal, the conference is successful.
The conference is successful.
Should it not be true that hiring security implies arranging catering, then the emergency exits are marked at the hotel.
If the hotel hires security for the conference, then the hotel arranges catering.
The hotel arranged catering for the conference.
The hotel has the venue booked for the conference.
The conference is not cancelled.
The conference is successful.
The conference is organized by an academic institution or a professional association.
Either the conference has multiple industry sponsors or, if the conference is prestigious, then the conference is successful.
If the conference is prestigious, then the conference is successful.
Provided that the proceedings are published in a journal, the conference is successful.
The conference is successful.
Whenever an agreement was made between the hotel and the conference, the hotel has the venue booked.
The hotel has the venue booked for the conference.
The conference is not cancelled.
The conference is successful.

(A1 → A2).natural: If the conference serves alcohol to attendees, then the conference has funding from the university.

(A1 → ¬A2).natural: Under the condition that the conference serves alcohol to attendees, the conference does not have funding from the university.

(A10 → (A8 → G)).natural: Whenever author2 submits a paper to the conference and the proceedings are published in a journal, the conference is successful.

(A12 → A14).natural: Provided that attendee1 registers early for the conference, attendee1 pays the fee.

(A12 → ¬A11).natural: If attendee1 registers early for the conference, then author3's paper is not rejected.

(A12 ∨ A13).natural: Either attendee1 registers early for the conference or attendee2 registers late for the conference.

(A13 → ¬A11).natural: In the case that attendee2 registers late for the conference, author3's paper is not rejected.

(A14 → A15).natural: If attendee1 pays the fee for the conference, then attendee1 receives materials.

(A14 → A16).natural: Whenever attendee1 pays the fee for the conference, attendee1 registers for sessions.

(A14 → ¬A11).natural: Should attendee1 pay the fee for the conference, author3's paper is not rejected.

(A15 → ¬A11).natural: Provided that attendee1 receives materials from the conference, author3's paper is not rejected.

(A16 → A15).natural: If attendee1 registers for sessions at the conference, then attendee1 receives materials.

(A17 ∨ G).natural: The conference is cancelled or the conference is successful.

(A18 → ¬A17).natural: Whenever the hotel has the venue booked for the conference, the conference is not cancelled.

(A19 → A18).natural: Should the hotel arrange catering for the conference, the hotel has the venue booked.

(A20 → A19).natural: If the hotel hires security for the conference, then the hotel arranges catering.

(A22 → A21).natural: Under the condition that fire drills were conducted at the hotel, the emergency exits are marked.

(A23 → G).natural: If the conference is prestigious, then the conference is successful.

(A24 ∨ (A23 → G)).natural: Either the conference has multiple industry sponsors or, if the conference is prestigious, then the conference is successful.

(A25 → (A24 ∨ (A23 → G))).natural: Provided that the conference is organized by an academic institution, either the conference has multiple industry sponsors or, under the condition that the conference is prestigious, the conference is successful.

(A25 ∨ A26).natural: The conference is organized by an academic institution or a professional association.

(A26 → (A24 ∨ (A23 → G))).natural: In the case that the conference is organized by a professional association, either the conference has multiple industry sponsors or, if the conference is prestigious, the conference is successful.

(A27 → A25).natural: If the conference is university-hosted by the local university, then the conference is organized by an academic institution.

(A27 ∨ A28).natural: Either the conference is university-hosted by the local university or society-hosted by an international society.

(A28 → A26).natural: Should the conference be society-hosted by an international society, the conference is organized by a professional association.

(A29 → A18).natural: If the hotel signed a contract for the conference, then the hotel has the venue booked.

(A29 ∨ A30).natural: The hotel signed a contract for the conference or an agreement was made between the hotel and the conference.

(A3 → A4).natural: Provided that the conference is scheduled late in the evening, the conference conflicts with dinner.

(A3 → A5).natural: Under the condition that the conference is scheduled late in the evening, the conference has a networking session.

(A3 → ¬A4).natural: If the conference is scheduled late in the evening, then the conference does not conflict with dinner.

(A30 → A18).natural: Whenever an agreement was made between the hotel and the conference, the hotel has the venue booked.

(A30 → A31).natural: Should an agreement be made between the hotel and the conference, a deal is confirmed between the hotel and the conference.

(A31 → A18).natural: If a deal is confirmed between the hotel and the conference, then the hotel has the venue booked.

(A5 → A4).natural: Under the condition that the conference has a networking session, the conference conflicts with dinner.

(A6 ∨ (A5 → A4)).natural: Either virtual attendance is allowed for the conference or, if the conference has a networking session, then the conference conflicts with dinner.

(A7 → G).natural: Whenever the keynote speaker for the conference is a famous researcher, the conference is successful.

(A7 ∨ A8).natural: Either the keynote speaker for the conference is a famous researcher or the proceedings are published in a journal.

(A8 → A23).natural: If the proceedings of the conference are published in a journal, then the conference is prestigious.

(A8 → G).natural: Provided that the proceedings are published in a journal, the conference is successful.

(A9 → (A8 → G)).natural: Under the condition that author1 has a paper accepted at the conference and the proceedings are published in a journal, the conference is successful.

(A9 ∨ A10).natural: Either author1 has a paper accepted at the conference or author2 submitted a paper to the conference.

(¬(A1 → A2) → A3).natural: If it is not the case that serving alcohol to attendees implies funding from the university, then the conference is scheduled late in the evening.

(¬(A20 → A19) → A21).natural: Should it not be true that hiring security implies arranging catering, then the emergency exits are marked at the hotel.

(¬(A20 → A19) → A22).natural: If it is not the case that hiring security implies arranging catering, then fire drills were conducted at the hotel.

(¬(A9 → (A8 → G)) → A11).natural: Provided that it is false that author1's paper acceptance and proceedings publication imply a successful conference, then author3's paper is rejected.

(¬G → A1).natural: Under the condition that the conference is not successful, the conference serves alcohol to attendees.
